subject: Hockey, Ice
Lockouts
lead_paragraph: Donald Fehr, the head of the N.H.L. Players’ Association, and N.H.L. Commissioner Gary Bettman held a second round of private talks on Saturday in an effort to move closer to an agreement that would end the lockout.
snippet: Donald Fehr, the head of the N.H.L. Players’ Association, and N.H.L. Commissioner Gary Bettman held a second round of private talks on Saturday in an effort to move closer to an agreement that would end the lockout.
